text: læa kar khxxphay thosʹ khx ngxi brxhim hı kæ bida khxng khea midi prakt khun nxkcak pen sayya thi khea di hı wi kæ bida khxng khea theanan tæ meux di pen thi pracaksʹ kæ khea læw thæcring bida khxng khea pen satru khx ngxallxhˌ khea k pliktaw xxk cak bida khxng khea thæ cring xi brxhi mnan pen phu xxnyon læa pen phu mi khanti thrrm
